## Hello World!

Welcome! I’m Payton—statistician, educator, and working at the intersection of data, dirt, and decision-making. I work on research questions that matter to land managers and scientists, especially in environmental and agricultural settings. You’ll find my work shaped by real-world data, practical needs, and lots of curiosity!

Currently I am a Ph.D. Student at Iowa State University working with Dr. Jarad Niemi.
